summary: Charlie Chan and his two eldest sons, investigate a murderous gang who is forcing an archaeologist to search for a treasure in Mexico.
cast: Roland Winters|Keye Luke|Mantan Moreland|Victor Sen Yung|Carol Forman|Robert Livingston|Nils Asther|Beverly Jons|Martin Garralaga|George J. Lewis|Leslie Denison|Erville Alderson|Nick Borgani|Fred Cordova|Juan Duval|Frank Leyva|Jay Silverheels|Charles Stevens
title: The Feathered Serpent
